system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice passives by Giving a friend information about a monument with passives. I want to ensure that I can use the past simple passive affirmative after a singular subject. For example, 'It was painted by..., it was built in... It is located at...'. Let's do a problem solving exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. I have access to some information about the Taj Mahal: who bulit it, when, and where it is located. Ask me short questions so tht I can answer one at a time. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a problem solving exercise, by Giving a friend information about a monument with passives, using, for example, 'It was painted by..., it was built in... It is located at...'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: What monument do you want to tell me about?
I want to tell you about the Eiffel Tower.
Where is the Eiffel Tower located?
It is located at Paris, France.
When was the Eiffel Tower built?
It was designed by Gustave Eiffel.
Good job! You have completed the task. Now, let's try with the Taj Mahal. What monument do you want to tell me about?
